char * Util::generateRep ( char **  reps  )  [static]

Generate a one line fileName from a list of repertory Ex : if reps is "file"|"name"|"michael.pdf", then a string with "file/name/michael.pdf" will be created.

Parameters:
rep repertories to test. Ends with NUL

void Util::createRep ( char **  reps  )  [static]

Create a local repertory made by a list of strings. Ex : if reps is "file"|"name"|"michael", then a repertory "file/name/michael/" will be created

Parameters:
rep repertories to test. Ends with NULL
